name: Water Gun Balloon Game
originalText:
As Water Gun Balloon Game comes into play, each player puts a pop counter on a 0.
Whenever a player plays a spell, move that player's pop counter up 1.
Whenever a player's pop counter hits 5, that player puts a 5/5 pink Giant Teddy Bear creature token into play and resets all pop counters to 0.

rulings.text: In a game with more than two players, players can use paper and pencil to track where their pop! counter is. That is, the tracker located in Water Gun Balloon Game’s art is fun, but not required to work.
Pink joins gold and every eye color imaginable in the set of colors in silver-bordered Magic games.

The pop! counters are considered to be on the inherent tracker in Water Gun Balloon Game’s art, not on the permanent itself. Those counters can’t be removed or moved to another permanent. Similarly, if you proliferate, you can’t add more pop! counters to Water Gun Balloon Game.

text:
As Water Gun Balloon Game enters the battlefield, each player puts a pop! counter on "0."
Whenever a player casts a spell, move that player's pop! counter up one.
Whenever a player's pop! counter hits "5," that player creates a 5/5 pink Giant Teddy Bear creature token and resets all pop! counters to "0."
